title: I wasn't a fan of K/DA before I saw the video.
body: Because I hated the fact that Kai'Sa had a new skin already and so many other champs are starved for them, then I saw it. And I'm still not, BUT I see the appeal, pop just usually isn't my taste (I have a few exceptions I listen to fairly regularly but not many) but I gotta admit god DAMN that video was sexy. Especially that Akali rap damn the animation was good.
